title: Chocolate birthday cake
ingredients: ['175g butter', '200g caster sugar', '3 large eggs, whites and yolks separated', '100g (70%) dark chocolate, melted and cooled', '60ml milk', '200g plain flour', '1/2 teaspoon baking powder', 'For the chocolate buttercream filling', '60g butter, softened at room temperature', '60g icing sugar', '60g (70%) dark chocolate, melted and cooled', '1 drop vanilla extract (optional)']
